error.generic: The application could not be submitted correctly. Please try again later.
error.label: Submission error
error.noFormAvailable: No application form has been specified for the plots you have selected yet. Please be in contact and we'll look into it.
error.noPlotsSelected: To submit a plot application, you have to pick plots on the plot searches page first.
error.notLoggedIn: Please log in first in order to apply for plots.

preparation.label: Preparation error
preparation.misconfiguredPlotSearch: A problem with the search you're applying to was encountered. Please try again later.
preparation.noApplicantIdentifierFound: An applicant with missing identifier data was encountered. Please verify that each applicant has either the personal identification number or company ID number set.
preparation.noApplicantTypeSet: An applicant with no selected type was encountered. Please verify that all applicant data is filled correctly.
preparation.unknown: An unexpected error occurred while preparing the application data for submission. Please try again later.

fileUpload.info: The maximum allowed file size is {{maxSize}} MB.
fileUpload.noFilesUploaded: No files have yet been uploaded.

mustVisitTargetPage.text: You must first fill the required details for the targets you're applying to in the second tab. You can open that tab by clicking the button below.
mustVisitTargetPage.title: Attention!

procedure.link: Information about the application review process

stages.decision: The city will make a formal lease decision and the lease contract will be signed.
stages.forwarding: The application is forwarded to the correct city department for processing.
stages.offer: If the city decides to lease the area to the applicant, a draft contract will be sent to them for commenting.
stages.review: The city confirms if the area is eligible to be leased for the applied-for use case and requests further information from the applicant if necessary. Other parties relevant to the decision might be consulted at this stage as well.

popup.title: How the application review process works

areaSearches.blurb: You can apply for leasing any available land and water areas for temporary uses, such as for placing masts, for agricultural uses, additional courtyards, further land leasing, sand silos, collection boxes or exercising parks.
areaSearches.heading: Area search
areaSearches.label: Area search

landingPage.heading: Apply for a land area lease
landingPage.introduction: The City of Helsinki offers plots and venues for rent for various types of activities. Please select the option that best represents your needs below.

commercialUses.blurb: This includes A frames, advertising spaces on bridges, outdoor advertising devices and election advertisements.
commercialUses.label: Commercial and advertising spaces

misc.blurb: For example city farming, dog training fields, bee farming, other land use and leasing, hunting licenses, kindergarten outdoor areas, water area leasing.
misc.label: Other land use arrangements

otherConstruction.blurb: You can apply for leasing any available land and water areas for temporary uses, such as for placing masts, for agricultural uses, additional courtyards, further land leasing, sand silos, collection boxes or exercising parks.
otherConstruction.label: Construction on streets or in parks

outdoorEvent.blurb: You need a permit to organize an event on a street, square or park if the event restricts the public use of the area. A permit is required if the event involves bringing marquee tents, tables, chairs, stages, fences or other structures to the area, for example.
outdoorEvent.label: Organizing an outdoor event

permanentFixtures.blurb: In order to place permanent fixtures such as pipes, cables, wells, building foundations, fences or walls to public areas like streets, parks and marketplaces, a permit must be acquired.
permanentFixtures.label: Permanent fixture installations on streets or in parks

terraceOrParklet.blurb: Setting up an outdoor serving area for a restaurant or café requires a terrace permit if the terrace is set up in a public street or park area. Setting up a glazed street terrace also requires a building or action permit. A parklet means a parking space that is temporarily re-purposed for other use.
terraceOrParklet.label: Terraces and parklets

drawOnMap.explanation: Note that the area you specify will be precursory only. We'll contact you to determine the exact area later during the application handling process. Areas colored in dark gray are not owned by the City of Helsinki.
drawOnMap.heading: Draw the desired area on the map

area.explanation: Besides Helsinki itself, the City of Helsinki also owns land in other cities including Sipoo, Espoo, .... The selected area will only serve as the starting point during negotiations.
area.heading: Tell us which area you'd like to lease
area.readMoreLink: Read more on the City of Helsinki website

attachments.heading: Attachments
attachments.input: You may also optionally include any relevant attachments here, such as photos of the area in question, lorem ipsum, dolor tai sit amet.

specs.checkErrors: Please check the marked fields before proceeding.

errors.endDateAfterStartDate: End date cannot be before start date.
errors.startDateBeforeEndDate: Start date cannot be after end date.

specs.explanation: If you're planning to lease an area for example for lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipiscing elit, sed do eiusmod tempor incididunt ut labore et dolore magna aliqua, continue by filling the following form. Tell us a few details about the area you'd like to lease and then fill the application. We'll respond to you as soon as possible. Fields marked with an asterisk (*) are required.
specs.heading: Apply for a land area lease

intendedUse.endDateHelpText: If you don't yet know the date you'd like the lease to end on or if you'd like to apply for a lease for an indefinite time, please expand on this in the detailed description field above.
intendedUse.heading: Specify the intended use and desired time period for the lease

specs.notLoggedIn: To apply, please log in first.

notification.body: <0>You can find all the selected targets here. You can return to plot search page to add more targets.</0>
notification.title: Do you want to search for more targets?

favouritesPage.title: You are applying for the following plot searches

applyChange.explanation: Description lorem ipsum dolor sit amet et cetera et cetera.

frontPage.bannerText: City of Helsinki plot, land, area and lorem ipsum rental

plotSearchAndCompetitions.explanation: Plots for long-term housing or industrial activities

questions.explanation: Please log in and contact us through the Messages page. We will get back to you as soon as possible.
questions.heading: Questions?

login.descriptor: To search plots, please log in through one of the supported services.
login.title: Log in

mainAppTitle: City of Helsinki plot and land leasing system

tooltip.cont: Click to continue drawing a shape.
tooltip.end: Click the first point to close this shape.

tooltip.end: Click the last point to finish the line.

mapLayers.helsinkiOwnedAreas: Areas owned by the City of Helsinki

sidebar.navigateToTarget: Open the details for this target

noTargetsToShow.body: <0>There are no searches of this type that you can apply to available at the moment.</0>
noTargetsToShow.title: Notice

selectionInAnotherTab.body: <0>You can only apply for one plot search per application.</0><1>Your currently selected targets are of a different search type than the ones shown on this page, and as a result, no targets can be added on this page. <2>See your currently selected targets.</2></1>
selectionInAnotherTab.title: Attention!

singlePlotSearchAllowed.body: <0>You can only apply for one plot search per application.</0><1>If one plot search contains multiple searchable targets, you can add those in the same application.</1><2>If you want to apply for targets in another plot search, you need to fill a new application for every plot search separately.</2>
singlePlotSearchAllowed.title: Attention!

errors.dateBefore: The selected date cannot be after {{date}}.

errors.lessThan: Please enter a value less than {{number}}.
